website_summaries.verdict: Designed to fit most newer MacBooks, this thin, cost-effective cover resists both dust and liquid while keeping its shape and color.
pros: Along with clear, comes in different hues and patterns for the notebook owner also interested in a little pizzazz, while still letting the backlight show through
Thin enough to close the cover without taking off the skin
Silicone quiets the noise from keystrokes
cons: Users are annoyed that the cover's brand name is on the spacebar
Some of the letters and symbols don't line up exactly when backlit

customer_reviews.title: Fits properly but cannot see key lights in dark.
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits great for the newer MacBook pros 13 inch. It stays well and minimizes the clicking of the keys, which is what I was looking for. However, I find it necessary to remove the cover when working at night (in the dark). You cannot see the keyboard light through this cover. This cover will also make the closing of the laptop a bit odd. Initially, I noticed that I could not close the MacBook all the way but after a while, it is no longer an issue.
customer_reviews.author: california girl

customer_reviews.title: Dirty right out of the box. Clear version looks dingy.
customer_reviews.text: Unattractive and dirty right out of the box. Looked like it has smudges all over it. I cleaned it but the clear version of this just looks dingy to me. I contacted the seller and they asked if they could send me the black one instead thinking it would look better. I said yet please and then I’ve heard nothing since and it’s been 2 weeks! Works well. Covers the f-keys but makes a beautiful machine look like crap.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gish

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a case for my new macbook and it came with a keyboard cover that did not cover all of the keys. I ordered this one and was really happy that it did! Also, I like that it's thin. My keyboard cover for my old (2011) macbook was really thick, which was okay since that one had really loud keys and the cover softened the noise. But I never really liked how thick it was. Since the new macbook doesn't have loud keys it's really not necessary to have a thick keyboard cover. Great product! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rajinder Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Slows down typing action
customer_reviews.text: The cover fits the macbook well, is extremely thin and would do a great job protecting the keyboard on this machine known for developing issues with keys if crumbs get underneath them. This cover does its job, but at a cost- it becomes difficult to type. The silicon grips your fingers so you cannot slide your fingers on the keys like you might do normally touch typing. For this reason, i will not be using this product, only in situations where it is likely crumbs will be getting on the laptop ( eating while working, on a airplane eating snacks, etc) . I really dont see how this could be practical in a day to day setting.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased July of 2019--Keys Wearing Off after a month
customer_reviews.text: Keys are already wearing off. I can see through the spacebar and the E is completely worn off after just under a month of use, and the I and O are worn down too....also the A. This review was in progress before and the only key wearing down before was the E and the spacebar. In a couple more weeks it just keeps getting worse and makes my laptop look like junk. Going to replace it with something new- as this is a brand new computer.
customer_reviews.author: Bohdan Cole

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Quite Fit, Impossible to Clean
customer_reviews.text: No matter what I did there was a gap between the space bar and command key. It also was so thick that it required a great deal more force to depress the keys. Also, when i got stuff on the keys (the reason I got the keyboard cover) it was impossible to clean. I ordered another keyboard cover from a different company and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: A must for desk-snackers
customer_reviews.text: I just about destroyed my macbook pro with crumbs (I often eat lunch at my desk) as the keys are so low-profile that you can get crumbs under them but you can't blow them back out again. Cleaning the keyboard out involves taking it to the store and having the entire computer disassembled. This cover makes crumb-removal as easy as lifting the cover & shaking it. You can rinse it with water & let it dry if you make a big mess. It also dampens my loud, angry typing during meetings.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in September 2018 and writing a review in March 2020. I ordered this and it came broken so Amazon sent me a new one (the one in the pictures). It's only been a year and a half of use and it is stretching horizontally. I'm not actually sure how this is possible?? Picture 1: Keyboard cover lined up with keys and there's a hump Picture 2: Keyboard cover lined up from left side. The keys are not aligned after "D" I don't recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: I immediately regretted buying this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted to dull the sound of my 2017 Macbook keyboard and protect the keys from smuges and dirt. This is maybe the worst cover I have ever used. The silicone is difficult to the touch and the material accentuates every single existing smudge on the keyboard worse than normal. I will probably send this back and I would recommend you spend your money on a protector with a little bit better of a feel to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Color is Already Coming Off.
customer_reviews.text: l read reviews before purchasing this keyboard cover and hoped that they color wouldn’t come off. Well, unfortunately, after a couple of weeks of use, the color on the keyboard cover has started to come off on frequently used keys (especially the space bar). It’s soft, durable, and easy to clean, but it’s not cute anymore. :( Spend a few dollars more and buy a better quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: This is great and fits perfectly except when my keyboard backlight is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great and fits perfectly except when my keyboard backlight is on, you could clearly tell the letters are out of place and aren't aligned perfectly. Also, the first half of it starting from the left has this weird stain/foggy like pattern I don't know if anyone can tell but if you compare it to the right half you will be able to tell. I tried washing it but it still looks this way. Could've been a 5 star rated item if it weren't for these two flaws that could've easily been fixed. :/
customer_reviews.author: Neva

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit properly
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a decent product; however, it does not fit my Macbook Pro as described. In addition to not fitting over keys well, it slides quite often requiring constant replacement and realignment. This product does the intended purpose of protecting the keyboard, but not as good as it could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2017" MBP and not that noticeable (clear)
customer_reviews.text: Fits a lot better than a keyboard cover I got for my other Mac keyboards. More importantly, keyboard covers are essential for the butterfly keys due to their sensitivity to dust. Also, the way the LED keys are made, they reflect any dust that settles in the edges. For whatever reason, one key has a line of dust I can't get out. This keyboard cover sort of hides the imperfection.
customer_reviews.author: shuenw

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL!! What Happened?
customer_reviews.text: Despite ordering the same exact thing months ago, when it came time for a replacement, it did not fit the keyboard of my MacBook Air 13" at all - wayyy too small. This happened to my Mom recently as well with the same cover - not sure what happened, but very disappointed because I loved the product before. Will most likely be trying a different brand in the future. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: Mo Gray

customer_reviews.title: Fits great. feels great.
customer_reviews.text: Could not be more pleased. Fits like a glove - I prefer silicone to the other plastics that are sticky and bubble up. Can't go wrong with this choice if you have a MacBook Pro with the butterfly keyboard, which others say are sensitive to dust being trapped under the keys and causing problems. I had a silicone cover for my old MacBook Pro and the keyboard looked brand new after 8 years.
customer_reviews.author: pd

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover, wish keyboard lights would show through
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits my MacBook Pro keyboard perfectly and keeps the keys clean without leaving a mark on the screen when the laptop is closed. I wish the lights behind each letter key would shine through the cover, but this is a minor complaint. Overall the product does what it should.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Does as stated
customer_reviews.text: I really like this keyboard cover over all. It is on a more of a silicone look, and feel. I haven't had any problems getting it to stay put on my keyboard so that's a major plus compared to other brands. It is on a slightly more mate and somewhat transparent look. The only minor issue I dislike is when you close your laptop it does leave slight imprint on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Dina

customer_reviews.title: I actually liked the product
customer_reviews.text: I actually liked the product, super thin and nice color, however, I accidentally purchased it for a laptop of the same size but not the same type, so it doesn't fit my keyboard perfectly. I just wanted to return it and get another one, but they're telling me it's going to cost me more to return it than i paid to purchase it???? so not only will I not be getting a refund, I'm also out some money if i just want to get rid of this thing??? honestly I'm only down like $7, so its just ridiculous, but that's a bad move on amazon's part.
customer_reviews.author: Norah

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: The cover dulls the sound of the keys nicely and doesn't inhibit typing in any way. It does not, however; properly fit the MacBook 12". The keys of the cover are slightly too close together. You are also not able to see the light through the cover of the backlit keyboard and the letters are opaque white rather than clear. The cover also arrived warped/curled so it doesn't sit flat on the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Protects the Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I did not know what to expect when I took it out of the packaging. It seemed very flimsy but at the same time you wouldn't want something any thicker or you would not be able to close the screen. I like the way it fits on the keys. No slippage and it removes easily. I type a lot and the cover does not affect the touch of the keys. I've had this on my MacBook Pro since January and it does not show any signs of wear. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amerika

customer_reviews.title: Makes the macbook keyboard psoriasis-proof!
customer_reviews.text: I have psoriasis so my head is like a saltine. Yeah, I know it sounds gross, but the flakes of skin actually gum up the keyboard CONSTANTLY. I've had to repair keyboards so many times on my macbook. This solves a lot of problems. It's easy to clean and keeps my head crumbs out of my keyboard. The surface also has a sticky quality to it which makes typing easier and faster.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to love this but...
customer_reviews.text: the letters don't fit perfectly over the keyboard. I've resorted to just leaving the key pad lighting off because it looks so distorted when it is on with the keyboard cover. Really disappointed, I gave it the benefit of the doubt when I ordered and it is a shame it doesn't align perfectly because I love this color. I've attached two photos with different brightness of my laptop so you can see how bad the keyboard gets.
customer_reviews.author: Imelda Montano

customer_reviews.title: Can’t see keyboard light.
customer_reviews.text: So i really wanted to love this. It is overall very good and stays put. But one of the key features i love on my MacBook is the light up keyboard. I cannot see my keyboard letters with this pad on. If i was an expert Tyler that do not look ar my keyboard maybe it would work. But i look at my keyboard often. The pic actually makes it look better than it does in person. In person they just looks blurred
customer_reviews.author: N.Sut

customer_reviews.title: It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fit very well over the function key due to a crease, but fits fine everywhere else. I think I just got a bad one. Laptop lid doesn’t close all the way now, but that's just due to the design of the laptop itself. Also, I got the clear one. It’s definitely translucent, not clear — go for the black one instead. Works fine for the price I paid. Hopefully this protects my keyboard from stuck keys like many are experiencing.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Residue and Fade issues
customer_reviews.text: fit my computer and is easy to type with, but the color of the pad wore down in only 2-3 days time. Also, it left a GROSS sticky residue on my keys that is clogging up the key gaps so I had to send it into Apple to be cleaned. DO NOT RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.author: Darby

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color, great feel
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to customize my MacBook Pro a bit so I decided to get this keyboard cover. This lavender is gorgeous and I love how it feels when I type. I also really like the fact that it is non-slip! This would have gotten 5 stars if it wasn’t for the little smudge that I found on the caps lock (see picture). I know it’s small and you can’t really see it but hey it’s enough for me to take a star off, haha. Anyways though, I’m pretty sure it was just the one that I received that had this defect :) I would totally recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley A.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a good fit because I recently bought a case from this seller that came with a keyboard cover and it fits perfectly. However, when I put this on my laptop keyboard, it's noticeable that the letters do not align with the actual keyboard. I'm not sure why,.. since I ordered the correct model but it'll do for now until I find another. The three stars that I gave it are because it isn't too bad, it's just not a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Hydeia

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Tends to bulge up over the space bar by the end of the session (on occasion, when I am really hammering away) but peeling up one end and dropping it back gets it back to flat. Really sticky on the keys, won't slide out of place, and seals out junk really well. It feels natural to the fingertips.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and effective
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would have adhesive on the back to prevent it from sliding around, so I was skeptical when it turned out to be just an overlay made of silicone. I’m happy with it though, because even without adhesive it stays put and doesn’t slide around when I type. It keeps my keyboard very clean and dry, as I can be quite the clutz when liquid is around. Just lift it off if you do end up cleaning undneath. Easy to change if you get bored with it!
customer_reviews.author: jandreas

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend the cover with the keys printed in black
customer_reviews.text: The product image made it seem more transparent, but in reality it is quite opaque. You can see where you fingers hit the keys as it leaves a mark upon impression (this is probably because of the oils from my fingers on the keyboard before I got the cover). I would recommend the cover with the keys printed in black, rather than being opaque to avoid this look.
customer_reviews.author: Jason K. Iijima

customer_reviews.title: Works As Described
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to lessen the noise I make when typing and to help keep my keyboard clean. I chose black and it looks really good. It also stays in place and I haven't had any issues with it. I also love the fact that it's keeping dust from getting between the keys. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DionsCloset

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2017 Macbook Pro A1708
customer_reviews.text: Got mine in dark navy for my space gray Macbook Pro and I'm loving it! Looks so sleek. Typing still feels the same to me... doesn't have the same clicky sound as it does when there isn't a cover. Great for me eating while working or watching Netflix and touching the keys and accidentally dropping crumbs. Horrible habit, I know but hey - I've found a way to protect the keys with this! Make sure you check the bottom of your Macbook to know which model you have and read the description clearly. I don't use the backlit function because I think it's a waste of battery so the backlit not showing through as much doesn't really affect me.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last well.
customer_reviews.text: I love these but end up replacing them frequently. ( every 2-3 months ) It tends to become stained or fade on the keys and stretches out as you use it so that it doesn’t fit the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: I was pretty excited for the new accessories for my laptop
customer_reviews.text: at first, I was pretty excited for the new accessories for my laptop. After receiving the product I immediately noticed that the backlight doesn't appear through which really bothers me and I feel like it should be a given. Overall it's a great keyboard protector and fits just right. At times when I​ type the product foes lift up or move out place which can be annoying at times which is why I gave it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Cardoso

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This product causes your MacBook screen to crack. Weeks after buying this my brand new MacBook has a crack on its screen. There needs to be a warning on this product. Apple explicitly discourages users with MacBooks with retina displays from using keyboard covers as the screen is sensitive enough to be damaged when you close the laptop with a cover on the keyboard. I deeply regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Banafsheh

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.text: While it is protective and feels nice, it often has a bubble right in the space bar. At least once a day I have to lift up the bottom row and straighten it out again, which isn't hard but it is annoying. It also leaves a residue on the screen, you can see letters when the screen is dark. It is nice that it lets the computer close all of the way.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie yeager

customer_reviews.title: Stretches out
customer_reviews.text: After less than a year, the lower right side of the skin has stretched out, so that the keys don't line up, leading to lots of typos. I will probably re order as it's cheap and I like protecting the real keys. But should be less stretchy
customer_reviews.author: Ms. B.

customer_reviews.title: Color is as shown and it's a cute keyboard cover ...
customer_reviews.text: Color is as shown and it's a cute keyboard cover; however, the letters on keyboard cover do not match up to the letters on the MacBook keys and therefore an overlay is visible. Other than that, it does what it's supposed to do in terms of protecting your keyboard from oil and fingerprints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wears down in 3 weeks so there are black holes in the keyboard cover and stretches out so is lumpy over my key board.
customer_reviews.text: After 3 weeks, there are very distinct areas where the color has completely been lost in this keyboard cover so I would not recommend this product. Also, it stretches out over the keyboard. I don't take it on and off. Mostly, six of the keys have totally faded in color so I just see the black keys underneath and I've only had this for 3 weeks. I would NOT recommend buying this because it looks super crappy now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Could be good if shipped/packaged better
customer_reviews.text: If it was packaged correctly, it would be a great product, but mine came with the edge folded up such that I can't get it to lay flat. I've tried everything I can think of for 2 weeks, and it still won't lay flat, so it's tricky to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Faberella

customer_reviews.title: Avoid avoid avoid!
customer_reviews.text: I have literally had this case for 4 months and it has already stretched and from what reason I have no idea. When I first purchased it I did realize it would move side to side when I would be typing occasionally. However, I accepted that flaw for the price and didn’t want to go through the hassle of sending it back. Needless to say this keyboard cover is crap and I would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Started to bubble shortly after purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to work out. The keyboard cover had a good week of sitting in place. After that it started to bubble and slide. I’ll continue to use because it’s the best that I have at the moment but I was hopeful for longer use considering I’m on my laptop at most 3-4 days/week....which to me isn’t a lot.
customer_reviews.author: jessica h

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard Cover!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and feel of this keyboard cover. I was looking for something that barely looks like I have a cover over my keyboard because I like the black simple look of the mac keyboard. It feels nice and gives me piece of mind knowing my keyboard isn't going to get messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Claire A

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this product for years for my laptops. After my friend spilled some wine on her new laptop keyboard, and it completely died, I’ve invested in this product. I’ve had a view drops of coffee spill on my laptop and it’s easy to rinse off the keyboard cover.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Keeps crap out of the keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I am a notoriously messy person, so I like that this keeps crumbs and dirt out of the keyboard, especially since Mac keyboards are so fragile and will get stuck if you get stuff under the keys. My only complaint is that it starts to lose its shape a little bit after time so then it doesn't sit right on the keyboard. It also leave an imprint on the screen from closing the computer, but nothing you can't clean off with some screen cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Cute and slick
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard cover is just a sleeve to cover the keys. Fits over the keys fine but occasionally you have to correct it because you can see the wording on the actually keys and it doesn’t line up to the wording on the cover. Other than love, love how the rose gold matches the rest of my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hatch

customer_reviews.title: ... the A1708 MacBook pro and makes the keyboard feel great. Only problem is that the light that the ...
customer_reviews.text: Cover fits perfectly on the A1708 MacBook pro and makes the keyboard feel great. Only problem is that the light that the keyboard has will not shine through this so if you like having the backlit keyboard on, this cover is not for you. Other than that, it feels great and is the same color as the actual keyboard so you can't really tell that there is a cover on it unless you look hard enough.
customer_reviews.author: Hemanth Y.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great key board cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a great key board cover, it fits perfectly, its aligned perfectly, feels great and looks great. Definitely quiets down my loud typing slightly. I would have given this key board cover 5 stars but there was a minor detail that that did bother me a little bit. On the spacebar it does say the word "MOSISO". It threw me off a little bit and my brain wondered for a millisecond if I had ordered the key board in a different language. I glanced at the rest but everything else was fine. It's not a deal breaker for me but I do prefer that it wouldn't have been there.
customer_reviews.author: haide

customer_reviews.title: it looks great but it doesn't fit perfect and what really bothers ...
customer_reviews.text: it looks great but it doesn't fit perfect and what really bothers me is the lettering on it are not transparent so the backlit keyboard is absolutely useless.
customer_reviews.author: hank

customer_reviews.title: Love the protection and feel
customer_reviews.text: I love these keyboard covers. I love how they mute the keyboard sound a lot, and are soft on your fingertips. The protection and ease of cleaning them is a major bonus, too! I have a couple in diff colors! It's also fun to personalize. :)
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: It works great; it protects my keyboard from all the dust ...
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot for work and I am currently working in the desert. After a few weeks of costansty using computer cleaner I decided to invest in the Mosiso keyboard cover. It works great; it protects my keyboard from all the dust and dirt that I encounter while on site. I hardly notice it while I'm typing. It's also easy clean. I'd recommend this to anyone searching for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Teelor

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my Macbook Pro 13 inch. Nice quality keyboard cover. Would have been much better if the key cover would let light out for the backlit keyboards. However, never had to worry about typing in a dark room. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Khob Raj Bhandari

customer_reviews.title: A must have.  Don't look any further.
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST! Have had other keyboard covers and they always felt different on the keystrokes. I type fast, so it really made a difference. I bought the black one and can't even tell that I have a cover. And no, it leaves NO MARKS on my screen. If you want to have a protecting cover for your new computer (I have the new MacBook Pro), this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Foxy Lady

customer_reviews.title: keeps slipping off the keys . . .
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't stay put on my keyboard so i have to continually put it back so it lays over the keys. I would not recommend purchasing this one - I have to start looking again for a different one to use.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was debating if I should buy this product or not, but eventually I decided to do it and I didn't regret it. Fits well and looks cleand and professionally made. Hey! This is a type cover don't buy it and expect to get a military grade silicon cover. It should be delicate enough to not interup typing. Stop rating bad just because U think it's not thick
customer_reviews.author: Blue owl

customer_reviews.title: Quality feels good but...
customer_reviews.text: I think the quality is good. The reason I give it a three star is because it is slightly thicker than expected and the laptop cover does not shut all the way down. Maybe it is just this piece I received that is a bit raised up. I would have kept it if it did not cause my cover to not shut down properly. I returned it without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Neoh Poh Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for your macbook (important considerations)
customer_reviews.text: If you have a new macbook pro, I wouldn't recommend any kind of keyboard cover. The problem is that Apple made this device with many limitations in mind. This cover in particular didn't quite fit the size of the keyboard (being to small) but that's about it. Otherwise its a fairly good product. The issue is that if you use it for your macbook pro, the screen doesn't close all the way. In fact it looks about 1/4cm cracked open. That is a deal breaker but maybe it's ok for someone else out there. Otherwise it looks just fine
customer_reviews.author: Justin Yu

customer_reviews.title: Would but another one
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black one without the touch bar for my MacBook Pro 13in (2017). It feels a bit weird because its new but it fits really well. The only problem that I have with it is that I can't see the light from the keyboards from underneath but that does not bother me considering I did not use them in the first place. Its very thin and its less noisy when I type. Its very easy to take off if need be. I was worried this would be too big or small but it fit just right. It does not move when I type.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: A keyboard cover is very important for keeping dust and dirt from collecting between the keyboard keys. It is also important to have a perfect fit and the Mosiso keyboard Cover was a perfect fit for my MacBook Pro. I couldn't be more pleased with the fit and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Diane  Girl

customer_reviews.title: eh
customer_reviews.text: I got this in serenity blue and it does not match the serenity blue laptop cover that I ordered from the same company. It also is the wrong size even though it is made for the laptop that I have, so I wouldn't recommend it. I'm really sad because I have ordered from this company before with no problems and everything is pretty good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can see the ware on it rather quickly and ...
customer_reviews.text: You can see the ware on it rather quickly and it leaves marks of the keys on your screen. Otherwise it does what its suppose to and actually nerfs the keyboard clicks, but not entirely.
customer_reviews.author: Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Just received the keyboard cover & I'm very disappointed in the fact that it doesn't align with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received the keyboard cover & I'm very disappointed in the fact that it doesn't align with the keys. The majority of the keys you can hardly read what they are because the alignment is so off. I have OCD so I probably will end up trashing this soon because it'll be too much of a hassle to return.
customer_reviews.author: Tameka Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard Cover Does Not Line Up
customer_reviews.text: The cover does not line up, so it looks like my eyes need glasses when looking at the keyboard. Very disappointing. One of the icons is wrong as well. I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PrettynPink

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep it's shape.
customer_reviews.text: This MOSISO black keyboard cover does not keep it's shape for too long and had to be replaced with a transparent version. I also found the keyboard's illumination feature does not come through this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Erik S. Lesser

customer_reviews.title: R.I.P - Rip after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed feel and look of keyboard cover overall. After about a month, left CMD key ripped cleanly over key seam. Also, after about a month, the cover didn't stay on the keys anymore - I have to re-seat the cover each time I open my laptop now. Looking to buy a new one now, but not sure what style/brand I should get.
customer_reviews.author: schtella

customer_reviews.title: Protects Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I like how this protects my keyboard, I spilled coffee creamer on my keyboard a couple of months after getting my MacBook and I panicked. I immediately ordered a case and keyboard protector because I don't want to destroy my laptop. This was a cheap option and it does its job. Everyone once in a while it will slide off if I hold my laptop at a weird angle and it leaves keyboard marks on the screen after it's been closed, but other than that I will never use my laptop without it.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one in deep teal color, so that it matched my case. I am so happy with my decision to get this item as an add-on! The color is beautiful (just as the picture of side view), quality is great (super thin), and fits the keyboard perfectly. I don't know how long it will take for the letters to fade out, but I am absolutely in love with this color. Spreading words to all my friends to buy from Mosiso!
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Not good for long-term use
customer_reviews.text: The cover stretches out fairly quickly, and it moves from the keys often. It is far too easy to remove, as it moves around so much. In addition, it gets dirty quickly and it is hard to clean. On the keys that I use most often (such as the space bar and delete key), oil from my fingers still somehow bleeds through, making the cover kind of pointless because the keys still get dirty, although perhaps at a slower rate than if there was no cover at all.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Bird

customer_reviews.title: It came in good condition and I did not see any flaws
customer_reviews.text: I got it for the macbook pro 2017 without the touchbar. Standard keyboard cover. Nothing extraordinary (its just a keyboard cover ). It came in good condition and I did not see any flaws. I am currently typing on it and it doesn't make the buttons too heavy. The only thing that bothers me is that the coating feels like it will start coming off sometime in the next few weeks. We will have to see. I think I would have loved it more if it were not for the feeling of the coating and the logo on the spacebar. Overall, a decent keyboard cover.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Good at first, but then...
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this product when I first purchased, but unfortunately it’s begun to move and stretch almost. I have to constantly fix it which is really annoying. Probably will end up taking it off or purchasing from another shop.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Protective!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keyboard cover for my Macbook Pro 13 inch and it works like a charm. It protects my keyboard from wet fingertips and crumbs. It's also very easy to clean. The cover stays in one place and doesn't fall off. The cover doesn't hinder the keyboard performance and works very smoothly. I personally like the clicky-ness of the bare keyboard but after using this for a while, I barely even noticed. It does a fantastic job! Highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Bubbles and doesn't show backlight of keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Started warping and bubbling a couple weeks after I got it and you can't see the backlight of the keyboard through it. It raises up on certain keys due to the bubbling which causes it to slide around a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Kyrie

customer_reviews.title: It feels great on fingers and keeps junk out of keys
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars because I review products for what they are. If your looking for something that is indestructible and glued down to your keys, this is not it. It has a clinging effect when applied to keys. It feels great on fingers and keeps junk out of keys. I use my Mac book with greasy fingers around machinery all day, and this does the job. Its really thin and Mac book closes great with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Overall thoughts
customer_reviews.text: Rubber are hard to clean in the beginning but what bothered me was the fact that my MacBook led backlights cannot go through the shield and so I have to remove it if I need the backlight. End cuts are not perfect but still fit nice and tight into the keys. Overall, it still does the job of protection.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Keys not lined up
customer_reviews.text: I have another one of these and it’s great. This one you cannot read the keys and they are not lined up properly so I have to look longer and harder than with any other to reposition. Wouldn’t recommend. Time waster.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: love this keyboard protector
customer_reviews.text: I say this keyboard protector is an absolute must for your Mac. You hardly enough know that's is there, that's how thin it is. Super easy to clean if a few drops of something spill on it. I have recommended it to every one! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AU

customer_reviews.title: not recommended
customer_reviews.text: collects dust really easily and can be hard to clean completely. makes your keyboard look grayish instead of black. the cover also starts to misshape and doesnt stick to keyboard well enough. i recommend the uppercase ghostcover on amazon so much more than this.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Li

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, blends perfectly on my Mac keyboard. I love, love, love, that it is so easy to clean. It is wonderful for preventing dust build-up around and underneath the keys.
customer_reviews.author: Betsey40

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect or seamless for a new MacBook Pro 13 (without touchbar)
customer_reviews.text: This cover really is the worst I’ve used to date. After 2 days there is a bubble in the placement of it on my keyboard at the space bar area. Very annoying to look at. That alone makes it not worth whatever I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: BEN B

customer_reviews.title: Like it’s not even there!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived promptly with minimal and easy to open packaging and has worked like a charm from the second I opened it. It has a nice soft feel and supplements the feeling of the original keyboard very well. I had originally hoped it would dull or dampen the sound of the keys on my Mac and it did! That’s not an advertised feature just a bonus imo. The keyboard cover is remarkably good at staying in place and only comes off when turned to ridiculous angles. All in all it’s exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan weaver

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted. I have never used a cover like this before and I am very pleased with the feel of this one. It offers great protection with great movement and touch.
customer_reviews.author: Joesma

customer_reviews.title: Protects your keyboard and looks good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Nice fit and looks nice. I had a clear matte one originally and it got really gross after a short time. Made my keyboard look dirty. This black one is much better. Dust gets on it and I can just brush it off and the keyboard cover still looks good.
customer_reviews.author: P Gee

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Ultra thin so you can close the laptop completely. I love that the key lights are visible, and its washable. Good protection from dust and accidental splashes. I got one with touchbar for my husband, and one for me without touchbar. We both love it!
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard Cover Warps and Stretches - USELESS
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard cover stretches out in only a few months. Not sure if it's fingertips being hot or greasy, if it's the laptop's heat, or what, but I know it stretched out in a couple months. Put up with it a bit longer, but ultimately had to buy another. Just because it's cheap doesn't mean it's good quality! Bought a better one and it hasn't even started warping yet. This one is trash, do not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MCE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this keyboard cover! This one was the third one I ordered because first one wasn't correct size but then the second one was the rose gold and you couldn't see the letters on the keyboard so then finely got this one that's a simular color and its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Overall great! A few minor issues.
customer_reviews.text: The cover fits perfectly, and it feels smoother than other covers I've used so typing is much easier. The letters/ numbers/ symbols are white so they're super visible even in low light. Since they are white and not transparent the backlight doesn't shine through (see picture). One thing that might bother some picky people is the logo on the spacebar - its in the lower right corner and not too big so its not too prominent but it is there.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia D

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fit A1708 Macbook Pro without Touchbar
customer_reviews.text: This does NOT fit the 2017 Macbook Pro without a touchbar (model A1708) as advertised! It's too small and I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: chupi

customer_reviews.title: Label is hard to read, color is inconsistent, everything else is fine
customer_reviews.text: The cover is fine but has some dirty marks that I couldn't clean off when I received them. I'd return and get the clear one if it wasn't so much trouble, because the label is very hard to read on the rose quartz cover, I also bought the rose quartz laptop case by the same company and the keyboard cover is not the same cover as the case
customer_reviews.author: io unit

customer_reviews.title: Love it, reduces the clicking noise on the Mac ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, reduces the clicking noise on the Mac 2016 by a landslide which was the sole purpose why I purchased this. BTW though, if you turn on the brightness of the keyboard it would not show with the cover on, which kind of sucks but  ̄\_(ツ)_/ ̄
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: I am happy I purchases this keyboard cover. It's easy to clean and the color is so pretty. I love the fact that it puts perfectly and protect my keyboard from dirt and keeps it clean. Great purchase....highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It’s thin and fits the keyboard well. It will easily fold up when typing if it hit the edge which can be annoying but it goes back into place. You can not see the light from the letters with the cover on which can be bad if you need to see them. The laptop closes perfectly. Overall all pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: ObjectiveHonesty

customer_reviews.title: Fits the keyboard well
customer_reviews.text: This product fits the keyboard well and also helps diminish the sound of the keyboard clicking. The only thing I don't necessarily like about the keyboard cover is that it is difficult to see the keyboard illuminated through it due to it not being aligned properly with the letters and light from the computer keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Completely useless to me and not worth dealing with a return
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit my computer even though it's advertised as such. Completely useless to me and not worth dealing with a return. Disappointed. Don't order this if you have a 13" MacBook pro with retina display. It will not fit.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: She really liked the range of designs available
customer_reviews.text: These are for my daughters computer. She really liked the range of designs available, it fits nicely on her computer with no bulges, but doesnt quite fit the cursor keys. Overall she really likes them - she got two - and we'll see how well they survive the school year.
customer_reviews.author: antoniosk

customer_reviews.title: Keys/text don’t match perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is beautiful (color and material) especially for the price...however, I’m probably just a little too picky. The keys didn’t match exactly so the materials hung over the edge a little. The biggest annoyance (to me) is the fact that the text on the cover did not match the backlit keys. If this is not something that bothers you, I’d totally recommend this cover!
customer_reviews.author: Tanessa Sestito

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: This has held up pretty well into Month 2. I understand these aren't meant to last forever, but so far it's doing better than other silicon keyboard skin.
customer_reviews.author: S.S.

customer_reviews.title: Sleeve is too thick
customer_reviews.text: If you don't mind taking the keyboard sleeve on and off everytime you open and close your laptop, buy this product. Otherwise, if you buy this, you won't be able to close your laptop completely. I do not reccommend. It annoyed me that the product says "ultra thin"
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Salazar

customer_reviews.title: covers well
customer_reviews.text: Covers my 12' MacBook perfectly. I had one on my old MacBook and loved it. Kept particles out of the computer and protected my keys from fading,
customer_reviews.author: Betty C

customer_reviews.title: If only it stayed in place
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard cover looks nice but it slides around a lot and every time I open my laptop it sticks to the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: I really love how thin it is
customer_reviews.text: It fit perfectly on my macbook pro. I really love how thin it is, you barely notice it. I bought the black cover so it can match my keyboard, it looks just like the keyboard. The only complaint I have is that the light from the keyboard doesn't show through the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Yennifer

product_meta.title: MOSISO Silicone Keyboard Cover Protective Skin Compatible with MacBook Pro 13 inch 2017 & 2016 Release A1708 Without Touch Bar, MacBook 12 inch A1534, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackPerfect to be compatible with MacBook Pro 13 Inch with Retina Display (A1708 without Touch Bar, 2017 & 2016 Release), also be Compatible with MacBook 12 Inch with Retina Display (Model A1534, Release 2017 2016 2015). Friendly Note: Please kindly check the model number "A1xxx" on the back of the MacBook before your purchase. Make sure you choose the exact same model number as the listing title stated "A1708" or "A1534".
feature_bullets: Perfect to be compatible with MacBook Pro 13 Inch with Retina Display (A1708 without Touch Bar, 2017 & 2016 Release), also be compatible with MacBook 12 Inch with Retina Display (Model A1534, Release 2017 2016 2015).
Provide the full protection for your MacBook keyboard (US ANSI) against dust spills, key wear and more.
Made with premium engineering grade material, ultra thin to 0.3mm won't hurt the screen and made it easier for typing.
Flexible, washable, easy to apply and remove for cleaning or disinfecting.
MOSISO 1 year warranty on every keyboard cover.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,041 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
